name: SLiME.BAT
description:
You are casually browsing memes and OH NO!

What's this? Slime... virus?

NOTE - Controls/Gameplay is not referred in game so refer over here-

A/D - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse Drag - Move Windows/Last Virus

EASY - Fewest Enemies, Most Health, Double Jump

MEDIUM - Medium Enemies, Medium Health, Double Jump

BRUTAL - Extreme Enemies, Lowest Health, Single Jump

GOD Mode - Needs to be unlocked by cheat

Windows can be used to stop lasers and slimes.

Cheats :-

Cheats need to be inputted into the browser bar before game starts. You need to find out the cheats from here :-
